title: No Assists with Urgot Ultimate
body: I may have missed it, but it seems like when Urgot fears champions, he doesn't get an assist from doing so. You may get it from the person that was ulted, but the people who are feared won't grant you any assists. Is it something that was missed or was it intentional?

replies.body: Just double checked in game, both the swap and the fear on Urgot's ult apply assists. Suspect you may have just missed the fear on the champ in question, if not it's certainly a bug we'd fix if anyone's got a demonstration of when it occurs.
Yes, they changed his ult to fear surrounding enemies. And they heavily nerfed everything else.
You might want to post this is Report a Bug section, probably more likely for a Rioter to find there.

Bard gets assists for Q stuns and ult

And anyone going through E, even an enemy who dies
He even had a bug for getting assists on ally deaths that way.

I've had it happen where an enemy walked beside me in jungle to be killed by a team mate of mine. No assist... I had sunfire cape.
Damn slow tick rate!
How does the Urgot fear feel?
Any CC should count as an assist, I hope it was missed or is a bug {{champion:121}}
